description: {"blocks":[{"key":"sbit","text":"Isolation of PBMC from human blood using CPT tubes, cryopreservation and cryorecovery of cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"clqvc","text":"This protocol needs prior approval by the users' institutional review board (IRB) or equivalent ethics committee(s)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dce0a","text":"Collect 8 mL of blood per BD Vacutainer CPT Cell Preparation Tube with Sodium Citrate (BD Biosciences, 362761). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f3ei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i6is","text":"Invert tubes 8-10 times and centrifuged at room temperature at 1500x g for 20 minutes with no brake. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":67,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbuls","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ihuc","text":"Using a 10mL stripette , transfer the PBMC enriched layer to a new 50-mL conical tube, being sure not to touch the ficoll layer, and add MACS buffer (PBS, 0.5% bovine serum albumin, 20 mM EDTA, pH 7.2) to a final volume of 50 mL, followed by centrifugation at 1800x g for 10 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":264,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dof13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mhca","text":"Following removal of the supernatant, resuspend PBMCs in 10mL MACS buffer and count using a hemocytometer with Trypan blue at a 1:20 dilution (10uL of cells mixed with 10uL of 1:20 Trypan blue solution). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r6dc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l8an","text":"Centrifuge PBMCs for 10 min at 300x g at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":34,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq5u7","text":"\nAspirate supernatant and gently resuspend cell pellet in cryopreservation media (RPMI 1640, with 20% FBS and 10% DMSO) at a final concentration of 1 x 77 cells/mL in cryovials (Simport, T311-2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":153,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lvdb","text":"\nPlace cryovials in a room-temperature Mr. Frosty freezing container with isopropanol as per manufacturer’s instructions and store at -80°C overnight. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn6n5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2esbd","text":"Remove cryovials from freezing containers and immediately placed into liquid nitrogen for long-term storage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ppsj","text":"For cryorecovery, retrieve PBMCs from liquid nitrogen, and thaw at 37°C in water bath. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btqk4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brn9c","text":"Once thawed (roughly 1 minute with agitation) slowly add contents of one cryovial to 25mL 37°C filter sterilized complete culture media (RPMI 1640 media, 10% heat-inactivated FBS, 1mM Penicillin-Streptomycin) in 50mL falcon and pellet via centrifugation at 300x g for 10 min at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":260,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"968g0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41dp","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend cells in 37°C complete culture media for cell counting using Trypan blue.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
